instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: So, I suppose it is time for your first real assignment as my pupil.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: I imagine the lapis may have been a bit easy to find for you. And to be honest, I already had enough to get me through the month. That was just a test.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: What I really need right now are some blaze rods for making potions, which are unfortunately only found in the nether dimension.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: You must create a portal from obsidian, find a fortress, and from there, destroy the firey machines known as 'blazes' they may drop a blaze rod when slain.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: It won't be easy but I believe you are proficient enough to complete this errand for me, are you up to this task?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Heh, ya got guts kid I'll tell ya that. I'm starting to take a liking to you!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Well then, I'll see you when you have the blaze rods!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Ah- I see. Well that's understandable.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: The nether is a really dangerous place and I didn't like the idea of you taking rana there anyways.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: As for the blaze rods... *sigh* I think I'll have to ask Gary even though I already owe him a favor or ten.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: I'll try and think of another assignment for you in the meantime.
